function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Substantial spread of SARS-CoV-2 from patients to health-care workers due to ineffective personal protective equipment.","Impact":"Increased risk of infection and transmission within hospitals.","Mitigation":"Enforce strict guidelines for the use of personal protective equipment and ensure proper training for health-care workers.","Technologies":"Advanced filtration systems, UV-C disinfection, and air purification technologies.","People":"Health-care workers, patients, visitors.","Owner":"Hospital management, infection control teams."},{"Description":"Unknown effectiveness of portable air filters in clearing SARS-CoV-2 in real-world ward settings.","Impact":"Potential false sense of security and increased risk of transmission within hospital wards.","Mitigation":"Conduct real-world testing of air filters in fully occupied COVID-19 wards to assess their effectiveness.","Technologies":"HEPA filters, air sampling and analysis equipment.","People":"Hospital staff, patients.","Owner":"Infection control teams, research organizations."}]}
